content: I think I'll look for a desk with some built-in cable management features, but also keep some cable ties and zip ties on hand for any additional organization. That way, I can have a tidy workspace without breaking the bank. By the way, since I got my MALM bed frame from IKEA, I've been trying to stick to a minimalist aesthetic in my home. I recently got a vintage armchair from a garage sale, and it's been a great addition to my living room.
